resources.string:
Track and Manage training of Tensorflow and Keras models remotely.

 This app lets you
	1. view model training(s) and related metrics
 	2. manage model training(s)
 	3. Stop model training remotely

Firstly, download the dl_tracker python package from the following link:
 	 https://github.com/thevarunsharma/dl_tracker

 Create a new model in the app by going to "My Models" tab. Copy the model key.

 Pass this model key along with your password as parameters to the new dl_tracker.Tracker instance in Python.

 While calling model.fit on the model instance pass the created Tracker instance in the list of callbacks.
